CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Noticeably , PSFDTBT exhibits significantly improved PSC performance when compares with the analogous 9,9-dialkyl-9H-fluorene based polymer P1 ( Scheme 1 ) , which showed general PSC performance with PCE of about 3.1% in our previous report.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Material Name" entities:

1. PSFDTBT: This is the name of the material being compared to the analogous 9,9-dialkyl-9H-fluorene based polymer P1.
2. P1: This is the name of the analogous 9,9-dialkyl-9H-fluorene based polymer being compared to PSFDTBT.

So, the Material Name entities in the paragraph are:

1. PSFDTBT
2. P1
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Sure, my apologies for including irrelevant entities in my previous response. Here are the Material Name entities in the paragraph:

1. PSFDTBT

So, the Material Name entities in the paragraph are:

1. PSFDTBT

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the Material Name entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PSFDTBT |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Noticeably , PSFDTBT exhibits significantly improved PSC performance when compares with the analogous 9,9-dialkyl-9H-fluorene based polymer P1 ( Scheme 1 ) , which showed general PSC performance with PCE of about 3.1% in our previous report.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Property Name" entities:

1. PSFDTBT: This is the name of the polymer being studied, which is an abbreviation for "9,9-dialkyl-9H-fluorene-2,7-diyl-bis(trifluoromethyl)-teraphthalocyanine."
2. P1: This is the name of the analogous polymer being compared to PSFDTBT, which is referred to as "P1" in the paragraph.
3. PCE: This stands for "power conversion efficiency," which is a measure of the performance of a photovoltaic cell or module.

So, in summary, the "Property Name" entities in the paragraph are:

1. PSFDTBT
2. P1
3. PCE
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Sure, here are the relevant entities in the paragraph that refer to material properties:

1. PSFDTBT: This is the name of the polymer being studied, which refers to its material properties.
2. P1: This is the name of the analogous polymer being compared to PSFDTBT, which refers to its material properties.

So, the two relevant entities in the paragraph that refer to material properties are:

1. PSFDTBT
2. P1

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to material properties, presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PSFDTBT |
| P1 |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Noticeably , PSFDTBT exhibits significantly improved PSC performance when compares with the analogous 9,9-dialkyl-9H-fluorene based polymer P1 ( Scheme 1 ) , which showed general PSC performance with PCE of about 3.1% in our previous report.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following entities can be identified as "Property Value" entities:

1. PSC performance: This refers to the performance of the polymer in terms of its ability to produce a high power conversion efficiency (PCE) in a photovoltaic cell.
2. PCE: This stands for power conversion efficiency, which is a measure of the efficiency of a photovoltaic cell in converting sunlight into electrical energy.
3. 3.1%: This is the value of the PCE of the analogous 9,9-dialkyl-9H-fluorene based polymer P1 in the previous report.

Therefore, the "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are:

1. PSC performance
2. PCE
3. 3.1%
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, I apologize for the confusion earlier. Here are the entities that refer to the value of material properties in the given paragraph:

1. PCE: This stands for power conversion efficiency, which is a measure of the efficiency of a photovoltaic cell in converting sunlight into electrical energy.
2. 3.1%: This is the value of the PCE of the analogous 9,9-dialkyl-9H-fluorene based polymer P1 in the previous report.

Therefore, the only two entities that refer to the value of material properties in the paragraph are:

1. PCE
2. 3.1%

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to the value of material properties, presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| PCE |
| 3.1% |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
